meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Thomas McIntyre Bobby Bretz Rachel Beckman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3990.

div.div:
2001 Holiday Kids Week game 5.
(Cheryl: Hi, I'm Cheryl of the Clue Crew. You must at least be this tall to play on Jeopardy! today. Stay tuned.)

td.p: Thomas McIntyre, a 12-year-old from Marino Valley, California
Bobby Bretz, an 11-year-old from Bristol, Rhode Island
Rachel Beckman, an 11-year-old from Danville, Kentucky

tr.td: WOMEN IN HISTORY
HICCUP CURES
LAND OF THE PYRAMIDS
TOYS & GAMES
OH, "I" GET IT
I'M TALL ENOUGH TO RIDE THAT!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This nickname of a Native American woman, Chief Powhatan\'s daughter, means "playful one"')

tr.td: This nickname of a Native American woman, Chief Powhatan's daughter, means "playful one"
